sources.title: Batman 1943 colorized cliffhanger serial (Lewis Wilson)
sources.description: Batman (Lewis Wilson) and Robin (Douglas Croft) combat a Japanese spymaster (J. Carrol Naish) who is making pliable zombies out of American scientists, including the uncle of Bruce Wayne's girlfriend (Shirley Patterson). 15-chapter cliffhanger serial I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.

metadata.Plot: In his first screen appearance, the Caped Crusader of Gotham City (belying the lethargic facade of his alter ego Bruce Wayne) battles Dr. Daka, Japanese mastermind of a wartime espionage-sabotage group. Daka has a radium-powered death ray that pulverizes walls, a classic alligator pit to dispose of enemies, and can turn men into electronic zombies who do his bidding and transmit video signals to Daka's lab! Batman has no Batmobile, but there are bats in the Bat Cave...
metadata.Writer: Bob Kane, Victor McLeod, Leslie Swabacker
metadata.Actors: Lewis Wilson, Douglas Croft, J. Carrol Naish
